welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fort Bonifacio, a vibrant city known for its rich cultural heritage and bustling city life. We hope you will experience the charm of our city and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and explore all the wonders we have in store for you!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it serves as the main hub for Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at the airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A small domestic terminal, serving mostly budget airlines.

wifi.note: Limited to 2 hours per device per day.
